name: Setu Advertising
description: We have been behind some of the most well known brands in Pune. Brands that are part of our lives. Brands that have evolved form merely being products or services. As Setu Advertising completes 31 years of existence in 2016, we are thrilled to reveal to the world our life’s philosophy – of being a #StartupAtHeart. With a spanking new office in the city of dreams, Mumbai, Setu is all set to get a firm foothold in national-level brand building across sectors. Welcome to Setu!

locations.address: 403, 5th Floor, Pride Portal, Shivaji Housing Society, Off Senapati Bapat Road
807, Satra Plaza, Plot No. 19 & 20, Sector 19D, Palm Beach Road
